com.threerings.opengl.gui
Interface UIConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
Button, CharacterTextFactory, CheckBox, ComboBox, CommandButton, Label, LabelRenderer, MenuItem, ScrollBar, ScrollButton, Slider, Spinner, StatusLabel, StringTextFactory, TextBillboard, TextFactory, ToggleButton
public interface UIConstants

Codes and constants shared by the UI components.
